Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;arm cannon^reset; to the ^green;annoying guy^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Delighted: Thank you for you aid. As promised: the cash ! Take this off my hands too, if you don't mind.
Troubled: I am in need of aid. I must admit I am a terrible engineer and cannot craft an ^green;arm cannon^reset; at the ^orange;armory^reset;. Might you assist? I am wealthy and can pay you!
